subject: Football
Video Recordings, Downloads and Streaming
Copyrights and Copyright Violations
Super Bowl
Television
lead_paragraph: Troy Haupt owns the only known recording of the broadcast, but the N.F.L. doesn’t want to buy the tapes or let him sell them to outside parties.
snippet: Troy Haupt owns the only known recording of the broadcast, but the N.F.L. doesn’t want to buy the tapes or let him sell them to outside parties.
